title: The 'More' tab appears on the bottom navigation of the main view
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And is not a fresh install or first run
custom_steps: When the user launches the app
custom_expected: Then the user will see the 'More' tab in the bottom rightmost location

title: Tapping the 'More' tab will open the 'More' section
custom_preconds: Given the user is in a main view of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps the More tab
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the More page which will have a list of table cells that are tappable including: "Teams" and "Standings" (when fav team is set).

title: Tapping the 'Teams' cell within the More section should open the Teams list
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the More section of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps the Teams button
custom_expected: The user is taken to the list of teams separated by affiliate, class and option to view all MiLB teams

title: Check that all settings are preserved when app is quit and relaunched
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the settings page
custom_steps:
When the user makes a change to a setting
And backgrounds, then kills the application
When the user relaunches the app
And navigates back to the settings page
custom_expected: The settings the user changed should be preserved

title: Power Management - Screen Auto-Lock - Test On
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the settings page
And the device is set to time out after a given time period in device settings
custom_steps:
When the user changes the Auto-Lock setting to On
And lets the device sit for the amount of time set in the device settings for Auto-Lock
custom_expected: Then the device will auto-lock after the amount of time set for Auto-Lock in the device settings

title: Power Management - Screen Auto-Lock - Test Off
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the settings page
And the device is set to time out after a given time period in device settings
custom_steps:
When the user changes the Auto-Lock setting to Off
And lets the device sit for the amount of time set in the device settings for Auto-Lock
custom_expected: Then the device will NOT Auto-Lock after the amount of time set for Auto-Lock in the device settings

title: Verify the user can access the About page from the More section
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the More section
custom_steps: When the user taps the 'About MiLB.com' button found under the ABOUT section
custom_expected: Then they are taken to the 'About MiLB.com' page

title: Settings: Verify all the links open up to their expected pages
custom_preconds: Given the user has tapped on the More button
custom_steps: When the user taps any of the links under Help and About
custom_expected: Then their respective pages should open either in a new window or within the app. (Test Contact Info, Blackout Restrictions, MiLB.com FAQ, About MiLB.com, Privacy Policy, Terms and Conditions)

title: Audio: Verify Gameday Audio option is available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MiLB app
AND the app has been launched
custom_steps: WHEN we select the More Ellipses
custom_expected: THEN 'Gameday Audio' will be listed in the available options

title: Audio: Verify selecting Gameday Audio opens the MiLB GameDay Audio page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MiLB app
AND we have launched the application
custom_steps:
WHEN we select the More Ellipses
AND we tap on Gameday Audio
AND we have tapped on Yes for the Leave First Pitch dialog box
custom_expected: THEN the MiLB GameDay Audio page will open
